info.name: Qameleon SDN Platform Collection PUBLIC VERSION

item.name: 00_Generic requests
NEW Create lightpath with no constraint
Get node edge point details RPC

item.description: This postman directory contains generic requests for retrieving information from the TAPI endpoint.

item.name: QAMeleon device Integration (NTUA)
NXW Create topology (SIM devices) WSSs scenario

item.description:
Postman directory containing the HTTP requests for:

- creating a topology consisting of the real NLL (from NTUA) and some dummy nodes
    

How to use it ?

First make sure to have network connectivity to the SDN Agent of the NLL, then create the topology. You can use the real device or the SIM devices.

Then, you can setup the laser channel as you wish.

item.name: OpenROADM Integration(TU/e)
item.description:
Intergration with OpenROADM device.

Case 1: real device integration with TU\\e partner (TU\\e OpenROADM case)

Case 2: dummy device (TIM OpenROADM case)

After using one of the two postman collection, then you can create a lightpath to test the actual integration

item.name: Lumentum Integration (TIM)
Lumentum REAL devices integration: complete topology
Lumentum SIMULATED devices integration: complete topology

item.description:
Postman directory containing the requests for the integration with Lumentum real and dummy devices.

For real devices you need the actual connectivity with the devices, for the dummy just the dummy environment.

First create the topology (real or dummy, as you wish)

then provision the lightpath you prefer.

item.name: TIM LAB: Laser + Commercial Transponders + ROADMs + OSAs

request.description: Used for the final experiment reported in DeliverableD8.4

item.name: NXW LAB: Laser + Commercial Transponders + ROADMs + OSAs

request.description: Same as TIM LAB, but using a dummy network instead of the real one
